data: ECHO-GL Liu et al. (2024a)
Heterogeneous graph learning based on earnings call data
Dual mechanism approach combining spatial relationships and stock dynamics

Dynamic relationship modeling through information entropy
Multi-relational diffusion process with parallel preservation
Shows consistent superiority in NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai (2016-2023)

Iterative label refinement for noise reduction
Accuracy: 59.1% Improvement in win rate in volatile markets

Dynamic market news attention mechanism
Learned sentiment aggregation optimized for prediction

Modality-specific and span-based mixing techniques
3-7% performance improvement across all tasks
